compilerOptions.baseUrl: Base directory to resolve non-relative module names
compilerOptions.moduleResolution: Specifies how modules are resolved for imports. The values are 'node' and 'classic'
compilerOptions.target: Specifies which default library (lib.d.ts) to use
compilerOptions.checkJs: Enable type checking on JavaScript files

_comments.exclude: tells the language service what files are not part of your source code. This keeps performance at a high level. If IntelliSense is slow, add folders to your exclude list (VS Code will prompt you to do this if it detects the slow down
_comments.include: include listed files as part of your source code. If no include attribute is present, then this defaults to including all files in the containing directory and subdirectories.
